text:
COVID-19 virus can be transmitted in areas with hot and humid climates?
From the evidence so far, the COVID-19 virus can be transmitted in ALL AREAS, including areas with hot and humid weather. Regardless of climate, adopt protective measures. #RIFAOagainstcorona
